text: Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ekikaran ko abhiyan suru gare. Unko rajgaddi chadna pachi Gorkha rajyale thulo Nepal banne sapana dekheko thiyo.
summary: Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ekikaran suru gare.

text: Laxmi Prasad Devkota Nepal ko mahan kavi hun. Unko Muna Madan kitab le Nepali sahitya ko unnatima dherai thulo yogdan diyecha.
summary: Laxmi Prasad Devkota mahan kavi hun.

text: Buddha, jasko janma Lumbini ma bhaeko thiyo, shanti ko pratik maatre hoina, duniya bhar unka upadesh haru prasiddha chhan.
summary: Buddha Lumbini ma janmi shanti ko pratik hun.

text: Mahabharat ek ramro Hindu dharmik katha ho jaha Pandav ra Kaurav ko yuddha ko katha le manav jeevan ko siddhant haru sikcha dincha.
summary: Mahabharat Pandav ra Kaurav ko katha ho.

text: Sugauli Sandhi 1815 ma bhaeko thiyo, jun sandhi le Nepal ko territory lai dherai samasyaa ma parcha, ani kehi bhumi Gorkha le gumaeko thiyo.
summary: Sugauli Sandhi le Nepal ko bhumi gumaecha.

text: Pasupatinath mandir Kathmandu ma chha, jun Hindu dharm ka mahatwapurna mandir haru madhye ek ho, ra dherai bhaktajan haru le tyaha puja garne garchan.
summary: Pasupatinath Kathmandu ma chha, dherai mahatwapurna mandir ho.

text: Birendra Shah Nepal ko raja hun jasko samay ma Nepal ma shanti ra samriddhi ko karyakram haru bhaeka thie, tarika ma bhitrano le baghchetra ra samriddhi ma prashna uthayecha.
summary: Birendra Shah Nepal ko raja hun.

text: Ramayan ek Hindu dharmik mahakavya ho jaha Ram, Sita, Laxman, ra Ravan ko katha le satya, dharma, ra tyag ko mahima sikcha dincha.
summary: Ramayan Ram ra Ravan ko katha ho.

text: Mt. Everest, jasko uchai 8848.86 meters chha, duniya ko sabai bhanda aglo himal ho. Yeha dherai mountaineer haru charnu garchan.
summary: Mt. Everest duniya ko aglo himal ho.

text: Dibya Upadesh, Prithvi Narayan Shah ko mahatwapurna upadesh ko sangraha ho, jasma rajya ko samriddhi ra rakshya ko barema charcha chha.
summary: Dibya Upadesh Prithvi Narayan Shah ko upadesh ho.

text: Rana shashanko samayma Nepal ma dherai samasya haru thiyo. Prajatantra ko lagi dherai sangharsha garna parcha.
summary: Rana shashanko samay ma Nepal ma dherai samasya thiyo.

text: Siddhartha Gautam, jasko janma Lumbini ma bhaeko thiyo, buddha banera sansar lai shanti ra dharma ko marg ko sikcha diye.
summary: Siddhartha Gautam Lumbini ma janmi buddha baneka hun.

text: Gautam Buddha le Bihar ko Bodhgaya ma bodhi briksh muni gyan prapti gare, ra unko upadesh le duniya lai shanti ko maarg dekhaune kaam gareko cha.
summary: Buddha le Bodhgaya ma gyan prapti gare.

text: Araniko ek mahan Nepali kalakar hun jasko kaam China ra Tibet ma pani dherai mahatwapurna chha. Unko kala le Nepal ko naam uchcha banayo.
summary: Araniko mahan Nepali kalakar hun.

text: Nepal Bharat Sandhi 1950 ma bhaeko thiyo, jun sandhi le Nepal ra Bharat bichko sambandha banayo tara kehi mahatwapurna kura ma asamman ko aabhas hune gareko chha.
summary: Nepal Bharat Sandhi 1950 ma bhaeko thiyo.

text: Sati Pratha, jun samaj ko ek durachar thiyo, Rana shashanko samayma Jung Bahadur Rana le isko ant gare.
summary: Sati Pratha ko ant Jung Bahadur Rana le gare.

text: Koshi Barrage ek mahatwapurna jalashrot ko aayojana ho jun Bihar, India ma chha. Isko pani le Nepal ra Bharat lai laabh puryaune garchha.
summary: Koshi Barrage Nepal Bharat ko jalashrot aayojana ho.

text: Sati ko sarwanashak prem katha Nepali katha sahitya ko ek mahan udaharan ho jaha prem ra tyag ko sundarta dekhaeko chha.
summary: Sati ko katha prem ra tyag ko katha ho.

text: Gorkha durbar Prithvi Narayan Shah ko itihas ko mahatwapurna bhag ho. Yeha bata Nepal ekikaran ko suruwat bhaeko thiyo.
summary: Gorkha durbar bata Nepal ekikaran suru bhaeko thiyo.

text: Birbal ek mahan buddhiman mantri thiyo, jasko upai ra tark le Akbar ko darbar ma dherai samasya ko samadhan hune garyo.
summary: Birbal Akbar ko buddhiman mantri thiyo.

text: Tribhuwan raja le Nepal ma rajnaitik kranti ko aghuwa banera, Rana shashan ko ant garna mahatwapurna bhumika khele.
summary: Tribhuwan raja le Rana shashan ko ant gare.

text: Bhanu Bhakta Acharya le Ramayan Nepali ma anubad garera Nepali sahitya ko suruwat gare. Unko kaam le Nepali bhasha ko unnatima dherai yogdan diye.
summary: Bhanu Bhakta le Nepali ma Ramayan lekhe.

text: Pasang Lhamu Sherpa, juna Nepal ki paheli mahila hun junle Mt. Everest chadna safal bhaekin thiin, Nepali himal chadhai ko gaurav ko pratik hun.
summary: Pasang Lhamu Sherpa Mt. Everest chadna paheli mahila hun.

text: Dhulikhel ko jharna sundarta ra prakritiko ramailo manchitra prasiddha cha, jun Kathmandu bata nadhikai duri ma chha ra paryatak haru ko thulo akarsan ho.
summary: Dhulikhel ko jharna dherai ramailo cha.

text: Janakpur dharmik tatha sanskritik mahatwa ko thau ho. Yeha Sita mandir ra Bibaha mandap prasiddha cha.
summary: Janakpur Sita mandir le prasiddha cha.

text: Rani Pokhari Kathmandu ma sthit ek prachin pokhari ho. Yeha hindu tatha bauddha dharmik mahatwa ko mandir chha, jun bhai tika ko din ma khas gari khulla huncha.
summary: Rani Pokhari Kathmandu ma ek prachin pokhari ho.

text: Dhurmus Suntali Foundation le Nepal ma bhukampa pachi ekikrit basti banayera dherai manav seva ko udaharan diyeko chha.
summary: Dhurmus Suntali Foundation le ekikrit basti banaye.

text: Sagarmatha National Park UNESCO World Heritage site ho jun dherai prachin ecosystem ko rakshya garne mahatwapurna thau ho.
summary: Sagarmatha National Park UNESCO World Heritage site ho.

text: Barsha ma Pokhara ko Fewa Taal sundar drishya le bharipurna huncha, ani dherai paryatak haru kayaking ra boating garna aauchhan.
summary: Barsha ma Fewa Taal sundar huncha.

text: Nalapani yuddha ma Bhakti Thapa le Gorakha sipahi ko netritwa garera Angrej fauj biruddha ladeka thie ra sahas ko udaharan diye.
summary: Nalapani yuddha ma Bhakti Thapa le biruddha ladeka thie.

text: Annapurna Circuit trekking ko lagi ek prasiddha route ho, jaha paryatak haru Himalaya ko sundarta ko anubhav garna aauchhan.
summary: Annapurna Circuit trekking ko prasiddha route ho.

text: Chandra Shamsher Rana le Nepal ma sati pratha ko ant garna ra modernisation ko karyakram suru garna mahatwapurna bhumika khele.
summary: Chandra Shamsher Rana le sati pratha ko ant gare.

text: Lumbini Gautam Buddha ko janmabhoomi ho, ra sanskritik mahatwa ko karan dherai dharmik paryatak ko akarsan ko kendramahaan chha.
summary: Lumbini Gautam Buddha ko janmabhoomi ho.

text: Tribhuwan International Airport Nepal ko ekmatra international airport ho, jun Kathmandu ma sthit chha ra paryatak haru ko mukhya entry point ho.
summary: Tribhuwan Airport Nepal ko ekmatra international airport ho.

text: Manakamana Mandir Gorkha ma sthit ek prasiddha Hindu mandir ho jaha darshan garna cable car chadhna parcha.
summary: Manakamana Mandir prasiddha Hindu mandir ho.

text: Jal Narayan ko mandir Budhanilkantha ma chha, jaha Vishnu Bhagwan ko bishal moorti jalma suteko awastha ma dekhna sakinchha.
summary: Jal Narayan Budhanilkantha ma chha.

text: Swayambhunath Stupa Kathmandu ko ek mahan bauddha stupa ho, jun Monkey Temple ko naam le pani prasiddha chha.
summary: Swayambhunath Kathmandu ko bauddha stupa ho.

text: Makawanpur ko Simraungadh ek prachin rajdhani thiyo, jaha Malla rajyako mahatwapurna itihas sangraha cha.
summary: Simraungadh prachin rajdhani thiyo.

text: Tilicho Taal, jun 4919 meters ko uchai ma chha, duniya ko sabai bhanda aglo taal ho ra trekking ka lagi prasiddha chha.
summary: Tilicho Taal duniya ko aglo taal ho.

text: Ghode Jatra Kathmandu ma hune ek prachin parva ho jaha ghoda daud ko pradarshan garinchha ra itihaas anusar yasko suruwaat Rakshas nasakna gareko thiyo.
summary: Ghode Jatra Kathmandu ma hune ek prachin parva ho.

text: Patan Durbar Square ek prachin Nepali kala tatha sanskriti ko sangraha ho, jaha bishesh gari prachin mandir haru ra durbar herna sakinchha.
summary: Patan Durbar Square prachin Nepali kala ko sangraha ho.

text: Tenzing Norgay ra Edmund Hillary le 1953 ma Mt. Everest ko shikhar chadhna safal bhae ra itihas banaye.
summary: Tenzing ra Hillary le 1953 ma Everest chadhna safal bhae.

text: B.P. Koirala Nepal ko pahela pradhanmantri hun jasko netritwama Nepali rajnaitik kshetra ma prajatantra ko suruwaat bhaeko thiyo.
summary: B.P. Koirala Nepal ko pahela pradhanmantri hun.

text: Gosaikunda ek pauniko taal ho, jun dherai dharmik mahatwapurna chha ra Hindu tatha Bauddha dharma ka anuyayi haru ko tirtha ko thau ho.
summary: Gosaikunda ek dharmik taal ho.

text: Karnali ma prachin Nepali sanskriti ko dherai udaharan haru paainchha. Yeha ko Himalaya ra tal-talai haru dherai sundar chhan.
summary: Karnali ma prachin sanskriti ra sundar talai chhan.

text: Dharahara Kathmandu ko ek prasiddha minar ho, jasko prachin itihas cha. Bhukampa le bigryaepachi, yo aba punarnirman bhaeko chha.
summary: Dharahara Kathmandu ko prasiddha minar ho.

text: Krishna Mandir Patan ma chha, jun prachin Nepali shilp ra dharmik mahatwapurna mandir ko udaharan ho.
summary: Krishna Mandir Patan ma chha.

text: Bindabasini Mandir Pokhara ma sthit ek prasiddha Hindu mandir ho, jaha Bhagwati Devi ko puja garinchha.
summary: Bindabasini Mandir Pokhara ma chha.

text: Bisheshwar Prasad Koirala le Nepali Congress party ko sthapana gare, ra Nepal ma prajatantra ko lagi sangharsha suru gare.
summary: B.P. Koirala le Nepali Congress sthapana gare.

text: Shivapuri Nagarjun National Park Kathmandu ko najik sthit ek mahatwapurna park ho, jun bio-diversity ko lagi prasiddha chha.
summary: Shivapuri National Park Kathmandu najik chha.

text: Rara Taal, Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo taal ho, jun Mugu ma chha ra sundar prakritiko udaharan ho.
summary: Rara Taal Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo taal ho.

text: Gautam Buddha International Airport Bhairahawa ma nirmaan bhaeko ek naya international airport ho, jun paryatak ka lagi mahatwapurna thau ho.
summary: Gautam Buddha Airport Bhairahawa ma chha.

text: Teej Nepali Hindu mahila haru ko parva ho, jun Bhagwan Shiva ko puja ra bart garna manaeincha.
summary: Teej mahila haru ko parva ho.

text: Chitwan National Park Nepal ko sabai bhanda purano national park ho, jaha rare wildlife, jastai rhino ra Bengal tiger paainchha.
summary: Chitwan National Park wildlife ko lagi prasiddha chha.

text: Shatrujit Rana le Nepal ko modern banking system ko suruwaat ma mahatwapurna bhumika khele.
summary: Shatrujit Rana le modern banking suru gare.

text: Sunkoshi Jalashrot Pariyojana Nepal ko ek mahatwapurna hydropower project ho, jun dherai bijuli utpadan garna sakcha.
summary: Sunkoshi Jalashrot ek hydropower project ho.

text: Nepali lok geet haru, jastai Resham Firiri ra Mohani Lagla Hai, sanskriti ra man ko bhawana prastut garna prasiddha chhan.
summary: Nepali lok geet sanskriti ko pratinidhi ho.

text: Pashupati Area Development Trust le Kathmandu ma Pashupatinath mandir ko maintenance ra unnatima kaam gariracha.
summary: Pashupati Trust mandir ko maintenance gariracha.

text: Indra Jatra Kathmandu ma manaeincha, jun ek prachin Hindu parva ho, ra yeha Living Goddess Kumari ko darshan garna sakinchha.
summary: Indra Jatra Kathmandu ko ek prachin parva ho.

text: Dhulikhel ma sthit Kali Mandir ek sundar dharmik mandir ho jaha Nepali sanskriti ko sundarta dekhna sakinchha.
summary: Dhulikhel ko Kali Mandir sundar mandir ho.

text: Kaligandaki River rafting ko lagi prasiddha chha, ra dherai adventure lover haru yeha rafting garna aauchhan.
summary: Kaligandaki rafting ko lagi prasiddha chha.

text: Siddha Gufa Bandipur ma sthit ek thulo gufa ho, jun paryatak ko lagi ek akarsan ko thau ho.
summary: Siddha Gufa Bandipur ma chha.

text: Khokana Kathmandu ko najik sthit ek prachin Newar basti ho, jun mustard oil production ko lagi prasiddha chha.
summary: Khokana mustard oil ko lagi prasiddha chha.

text: Tansen Palpa ma sthit ek prachin Nepali sahar ho, jaha Rana kaleen mahal haru ani sundar drishya paainchha.
summary: Tansen Palpa ko ek prachin sahar ho.

text: Koshi Nadi Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo nadi ho, jun tarai ko bhumi sinchana ma mahatwapurna chha.
summary: Koshi Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo nadi ho.

text: Panch Pokhari Sindhupalchok ma chha, jun ek pauniko thau ho ra Hindu dharma ma mahatwapurna manincha.
summary: Panch Pokhari Sindhupalchok ma chha.

text: Kumbheshwar Mandir Lalitpur ma chha, jun ek prasiddha Shiva Mandir ho ra Malla kal ma baneko ho.
summary: Kumbheshwar Mandir Lalitpur ma chha.

text: Langtang National Park Nepal ko ek mahatwapurna national park ho, jun Himalayan biodiversity ko rakshya ko lagi sthapana gariyeko ho.
summary: Langtang National Park Himalayan biodiversity ko lagi mahatwapurna ho.

text: Dhaulagiri Himal duniya ko saataucha uchai ko parbat ho, jun Nepali parbat haru ko gaurav ho.
summary: Dhaulagiri duniya ko saataucha thulo parbat ho.

text: Chhath parva Hindu dharmik parva ho, jun surya devata ko puja garna manaeincha, bises gari tarai ma yo dherai mahatwapurna chha.
summary: Chhath surya devata ko puja ho.

text: Nepal ko prachin rajdhani Bhaktapur ho, jun kala, sanskriti, ra prachin durbar square le prasiddha chha.
summary: Bhaktapur Nepal ko prachin rajdhani ho.

text: Janaki Mandir Janakpur ma chha, jun Sita Mata ko mandir ho ra Mithila sanskriti ko pratinidhi ho.
summary: Janaki Mandir Sita Mata ko mandir ho.

text: Pokhara ko Mahendra Gufa ek prachin limestone cave ho, jaha dherai paryatak herna aauchhan.
summary: Mahendra Gufa Pokhara ma chha.

text: Tilaurakot Kapilvastu ma chha, jun Buddha ko balyakal ko mahal ho bhanincha ra dherai dharmik mahatwapurna chha.
summary: Tilaurakot Buddha ko balyakal ko mahal ho.

text: Bandipur ek sundar pahadi sahar ho, jun Newar sanskriti ko jhalak dekhna sakinchha ra Himalaya ka sundar drishya herna milchha.
summary: Bandipur Newar sanskriti ra Himalaya ko lagi prasiddha ho.

text: Boudhanath Stupa Kathmandu ma chha, jun ek prasiddha bauddha stupa ho ra UNESCO World Heritage Site ma suchet chha.
summary: Boudhanath Kathmandu ko prasiddha stupa ho.

text: Narayan Gopal Nepali geet sangit ko triveni hun, jasko geet haru le Nepali man ko bhawana chhune kaam garcha.
summary: Narayan Gopal Nepali geet sangit ko triveni hun.

text: Madhesh ko Mithila sanskriti dherai dhanik chha, jun lok geet, mithai, ra tihar parvako mahatwa ma dekhinchha.
summary: Mithila sanskriti Madhesh ko gaurav ho.

text: Dharan ko Bhedetar ek ramailo thau ho, jun Hill Station ko roop ma paryatak haru ko akarsan ho.
summary: Bhedetar Dharan ko ek ramailo thau ho.

text: Laliguras Ilam ma dherai thau ma phulchha, ra yo Nepal ko rashtriya phool pani ho.
summary: Laliguras Nepal ko rashtriya phool ho.

text: Mustang Nepal ko ek sundar himali kshetra ho, jun dharmik ra paryatan ka lagi dherai prasiddha chha.
summary: Mustang dharmik ra paryatan ko lagi prasiddha ho.

summary: Duna Tapari Nepali sanskriti ho.

text: Sagarmatha Himal Nepal ko gaurav ho, ra yo duniya ko sabai bhanda uncha parbat ho.

summary: Lumbini Buddha ko janmabhoomi ra dharmik thau ho.

summary: Tansen ma itihas ra prachin sanskriti dekhna milchha.

text: Rara Taal, Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo taal ho, jaha sundar drishya ra adventure ko anubhav garna milcha.
summary: Rara Taal sundarta ra adventure ko thau ho.

text: Boudhanath Stupa Kathmandu ma chha, jun Nepali Bauddha sanskritiko mahatwapurna stupa ho.
summary: Boudhanath Nepal ko mahatwapurna Bauddha stupa ho.

text: Pokhara ek sundar sahar ho, jaha Fewa Taal, Devi's Falls, ra Annapurna Himalayan view dekhna milcha.
summary: Pokhara Himalaya ra taal ko sundar sahar ho.

text: Mustang ek himali kshetra ho, jaha prachin gaun, monasteries, ra Himalaya ka drishya herna milchha.
summary: Mustang himal ra prachin sanskriti ko thau ho.

text: Sagarmatha National Park UNESCO World Heritage Site ho, jaha Himalaya ko himali drishya ra wildlife paainchha.
summary: Sagarmatha National Park Himalaya ra wildlife ko lagi prasiddha ho.

text: Tilaurakot Gautam Buddha ko rajkumari jeevan sang sambandhit thau ho, jaha dherai prachin sthapatyaharu paainchha.
summary: Tilaurakot Buddha ko prachin itihas sang jodne thau ho.

text: Gosaikunda taal Hindu dharmik mahatwapurna taal ho, jaha hajaaro yatri haru jane garchhan.
summary: Gosaikunda ek mahatwapurna dharmik taal ho.

text: Karnali Nepal ko sabai bhanda lambai nadi ho, jaha rafting ra adventure activities garna milcha.
summary: Karnali adventure ra rafting ko lagi prasiddha nadi ho.

text: Janaki Mandir Mithila sanskritiko ek ramailo udaharan ho, jun Janakpur ma sthit chha.
summary: Janaki Mandir Mithila sanskritiko ramailo mandir ho.

text: Bandipur ek sundar pahadi gaun ho, jaha prachin newar sanskriti ko jhalak ra Himalaya ko drishya herna milcha.
summary: Bandipur sanskriti ra Himalaya ko drishya ko lagi prasiddha ho.

text: Ilama ka chiya bagan Nepali chiya sanskritiko mahatwapurna hissa ho, jaha sundar drishya herna milcha.
summary: Ilama chiya ra sundarta ko thau ho.

text: Chitwan National Park Nepal ko wildlife ko lagi prasiddha park ho, jaha rare species dekhna milchha.
summary: Chitwan National Park wildlife ko lagi mahatwapurna chha.

text: Barpak ek prachin gaun ho, jun Gorkha ma chha ra 2015 ko bhukampa ko epicenter thiyo.
summary: Barpak prachin itihas ra bhukampa sang jodne thau ho.

text: Kalinchowk hiking ra snow activities ko lagi prasiddha thau ho, jaha Bhagwati Mandir pani chha.
summary: Kalinchowk hiking ra Bhagwati Mandir ko lagi prasiddha ho.

text: Gundruk Nepali khana ko ek authentic part ho, jun dherai Nepali ghar haru ma khaincha.
summary: Gundruk Nepali khana ko authentic dish ho.

text: Rani Mahal, Palpa ko ek historical palace ho, jun Nepali Taj Mahal ko naam le pani chinchha.
summary: Rani Mahal ek prasiddha historical mahal ho.

text: Swayambhunath Stupa Kathmandu ko ek prachin stupa ho, jun Monkey Temple ko naam le prasiddha chha.
summary: Swayambhunath prachin ra prasiddha stupa ho.

text: Chandragiri Hills Kathmandu ko najik ek paryatan thau ho, jaha cable car ride ra himali drishya ko maja linchha.
summary: Chandragiri Hills drishya ra cable car ko lagi prasiddha ho.

text: Pashupatinath Mandir Nepal ko ek dharmik tatha sanskritik mandir ho, jun Hindu dharma ko lagi mahatwapurna chha.
summary: Pashupatinath ek mahatwapurna dharmik mandir ho.

text: Patan Durbar Square Kathmandu Upatyaka ko ek prachin sanskritik thau ho, jaha prachin kalatmak kaam dekhna milchha.
summary: Patan Durbar Square prachin kala ra sanskriti ko thau ho.

text: Pathivara Devi Mandir Taplejung ma chha, jun Hindu dharmik tirtha yatra ko ek mahatwapurna thau ho.
summary: Pathivara ek mahatwapurna dharmik mandir ho.

text: Changu Narayan Mandir Kathmandu Upatyaka ko ek prachin Vishnu Mandir ho, jun UNESCO Heritage Site pani ho.
summary: Changu Narayan ek prachin ra mahatwapurna mandir ho.

text: Dhulikhel ek sundar pahadi sahar ho, jaha sunrise view ra himali drishya dekhna milchha.
summary: Dhulikhel drishya ra sunrise ko lagi prasiddha ho.

text: Nagarkot Kathmandu ko najik ek ramailo thau ho, jaha Himalaya ko sundar drishya dekhna milchha.
summary: Nagarkot Himalaya herna ko lagi ramailo thau ho.

text: Antu Danda Ilam ma chha, jun Nepal ko ek sundar sunrise point ho.
summary: Antu Danda ek sundar sunrise point ho.

text: Khumbu Glacier Everest region ma chha, jun duniya ko sabai bhanda uchai ma chha ra trekking ka lagi mahatwapurna ho.
summary: Khumbu Glacier trekking ra uchai ko lagi prasiddha ho.

text: Shey Phoksundo Lake Dolpa ma chha, jun Nepal ko sabai bhanda gahiro taal ho ra sundar drishya ko lagi prasiddha chha.
summary: Shey Phoksundo sundar ra gahiro taal ho.

text: Rhododendron ko phool, Nepal ko rashtriya phool ho, jun trekking trail haru ma sundar jhalko dinchha.
summary: Rhododendron Nepal ko rashtriya phool ho.

text: Manakamana Mandir Gorkha ma chha, jaha cable car bata jane yatra prasiddha chha.
summary: Manakamana cable car ko lagi prasiddha mandir ho.

text: Tilicho Lake sabai bhanda uchai ma chha, jun Annapurna trekking route ma pareko chha.
summary: Tilicho Lake uchai ma pareko sundar taal ho.

text: Palanchowk Bhagwati Mandir Kavre ma chha, jun Hindu dharmik yatra ko ek mahatwapurna thau ho.
summary: Palanchowk Bhagwati ek mahatwapurna dharmik thau ho.

text: Shuklaphanta National Park Tarai kshetra ma chha, jun wildlife ra rare species ko lagi prasiddha chha.
summary: Shuklaphanta wildlife ko lagi mahatwapurna ho.

text: Ghandruk Annapurna region ko ek sundar gurung gaun ho, jaha trekking ka lagi prasiddha ho.
summary: Ghandruk trekking ra gurung sanskriti ko thau ho.

text: Rupa Taal Pokhara ma chha, jun Fewa taal jasto ramailo taal ho ra fishing ko lagi prasiddha chha.
summary: Rupa Taal ramailo ra fishing ko lagi prasiddha taal ho.

text: Bandipur ma Newar sanskriti ko jhalak, prachin bhawan haru ra Himalaya ko sundar drishya dekhna milchha.
summary: Bandipur sanskriti ra sundarta ko jhalak ho.
